<span id="website"></span>
= Website =

This website is built using [https://docusaurus.io/ Docusaurus 2], a modern static website generator.

<span id="installation"></span>
=== Installation ===

<pre>$ yarn</pre>
<span id="local-development"></span>
=== Local Development ===

<pre>$ yarn start</pre>
This command starts a local development server and opens up a browser window. Most changes are reflected live without having to restart the server.

<span id="build"></span>
=== Build ===

<pre>$ yarn build</pre>
This command generates static content into the <code>build</code> directory and can be served using any static contents hosting service.

<span id="deployment"></span>
=== Deployment ===

Using SSH:

<pre>$ USE_SSH=true yarn deploy</pre>
Not using SSH:

<pre>$ GIT_USER=&lt;Your GitHub username&gt; yarn deploy</pre>
If you are using GitHub pages for hosting, this command is a convenient way to build the website and push to the <code>gh-pages</code> branch.
